headline: Why Charles Schwab (SCHW) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of financial services giant Charles Schwab (NYSE:SCHW) fell 5.8% in the afternoon session after a significantly weaker-than-expected U.S. jobs report sparked fears of an economic slowdown, dragging down the broader market and economically sensitive sectors like banking. The U.S. economy added only 22,000 jobs in August, falling far short of the estimated 75,000. This report from the labor market prompted a sell-off as investors weighed the possibility of a recession. The banking sector wa

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Apple, Novartis, Charles Schwab, Community Bancorp and Optex Systems
summary: Zacks spotlights Apple, Novartis, Charles Schwab, Community Bancorp, and Optex Systems as key movers, with microcap standouts delivering outsized gains.
